item.title: Run Memcached using Private Registry
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using private Docker registry KubeDB operator supports using private Docker registry. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run Memcached database using private Docker images. Before You Begin Read concept of Memcached Version Catalog to learn detail concepts of MemcachedVersion object. You need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
